name: Rollback
description: Run a powershell script to rollback deployments. Task execution context is available in the powershell context for implementing conditional rollback
author: ms-devlabs

inputs.name: type
inputs.label: Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide Source for the rollback script. File Path or Inline Script

inputs.name: rollbackpowershellfile
inputs.label: Script Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the script. Should be fully qualified path or relative to the default working directory. Tasks execution details shall be available in Release_Tasks environment variable.

inputs.name: additionalarguments
inputs.label: Script Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional parameters to pass to PowerShell.  Can be either ordinal or named parameters.

inputs.name: workingFolder
inputs.label: Working folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory when script is run.  Defaults to the folder where the script is located.

inputs.name: script
inputs.label: Script
inputs.defaultValue: Write-Host 'Rollback logic goes here as a powershell script'
inputs.helpMarkDown: Powershell script to perform rollback. Execution is relative to the current working directory. Tasks execution details shall be available in Release_Tasks environment variable.
